scripts.setup-local: yarn remove-unsupported-array && sh ./create-subgraph.sh && yarn create-local && yarn codegen && yarn build && sh ./deploy-local.sh
scripts.setup-test: yarn remove-unsupported-array && sh ./create-subgraph.sh mumbai && yarn codegen && yarn build && sh ./deploy.sh
scripts.setup-prod: yarn remove-unsupported-array && sh ./create-subgraph.sh matic && yarn codegen && yarn build && sh ./deploy.sh targecy
scripts.ship-local: yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn deploy-local
